principles: Fusion: SimCity mechanics + Bloomberg Terminal density + Cyberpunk aesthetics
Depth: Glassmorphism over complex data maps
Contrast: Void black backgrounds vs. searing neon highlights

usage_rules: Headings MUST use 'Unbounded' with tight tracking (-0.02em).
Body text MUST use 'Rajdhani' for a technical, HUD-like feel.
All financial data (TON amounts, coordinates) MUST use 'JetBrains Mono'.

layout.spacing: Generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside containers, tight gaps (gap-2) for data grids.
layout.container_style: Glassmorphism: bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl

buttons.primary: bg-cyber-cyan text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,240,255,0.5)] transition-all clip-path-polygon
buttons.connect_wallet: bg-ton-blue hover:bg-ton-blue/80 text-white font-rajdhani font-bold rounded-xl shadow-lg hover:shadow-ton-blue/20 transition-all

cards.style: bg-panel/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 rounded-2xl hover:border-cyber-cyan/30 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border border-white/10 focus:border-cyber-cyan/50 text-white font-rajdhani rounded-lg h-12 px-4

map_grid.tech: HTML5 Canvas (react-konva) or raw Canvas API for 10,000 cells performance.
map_grid.visuals: Neon grid lines (opacity 0.2), glowing filled cells for owned land. Hover state: bright white outline.

effects: Scanlines: Overlay a subtle repeating linear gradient for a CRT monitor effect.
Noise: Add a fixed position div with noise texture at 3% opacity over the entire app.
decorations: Corner accents: SVG brackets at the corners of panels.
Data streams: Scrolling numbers/hex codes in the background (low opacity).

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge lucide-react react-konva konva` (or yarn add).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Update `tailwind.config.js` with the colors and fonts defined above.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the `Layout` component with the global noise overlay and font imports.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Implement the `MapGrid` using Canvas (Konva) for performance. Do NOT use 10,000 divs.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Build the `WalletConnect` button using TON Connect UI patterns but styled with the Cyber-Industrial theme.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Ensure all text contrasts meet APCA standards (light text on dark backgrounds).

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
